UniprotID	P61163

EntryName	ACTZ_HUMAN
ProteinName	Alpha-centractin (Centractin) (ARP1) (Actin-RPV) (Centrosome-associated actin homolog)
GeneName	ACTR1A CTRN1
Length	376
Function	Part of the ACTR1A/ACTB filament around which the dynactin complex is built. The dynactin multiprotein complex activates the molecular motor dynein for ultra-processive transport along microtubules.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Microtubule organizing center; Centrosome; Cytoplasm; Cell cortex
